FUNCTION_BLOCK SR
Realizes a bistable set-dominat latch
(* Example declaration *)
SRInst
:
SR
;
(* Example in ST *)
SRInst
(
SET1
:=
VarBOOL1
,
RESET
:=
VarBOOL2
);
VarBOOL3
:=
SRInst.Q1
;
